title: Wondering
body:
Shampions gets different bonus from items. Like Azir gets a speed bonus from cooldown gear.

But where can i read of this bonuses?

replies.body: Champion stories, detailed abilities, and more can be found in our[ Game Info ](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/)site.  Just select a champion and check out all their details.  Happy researching!

Azir is a unique case, and if you read his passive, it specifically states that he gets that bonus. Any champion that gets special bonuses from stats beyond the norm will have it listed somewhere in their abilities/passive. Or, you could simply go check out the wiki.
